page.title: 04FOOTPATHS AND BRIDLEWAYS.
page.content: {ECOLOGY, GRT CANFIELD.}page 3 of 3{Footpaths. There is a good network of{footpaths {and bridle paths}in this area. One stretches from the corner of Green Street and goes all the was to Alburys Farm. The footpath runs between fields and is one of the few places in an arable farming area where it is possible to walk, ride walk dogs, ride bicycles etc. freely without worrying about the traffic on the roads or the farmers' crops. It is a good indication of changing seasons, varying from deep snow in winter when it is almost unpassable to spring with wild flowers beginning to appear and summer when the track is dusty and dry. Best of all is autumn when the acorns are falling from the oak trees and all the trees turn a glorious colour.
